duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the total operation of the store, ensuring maximum sales and profitability through effective guest services and expense control.
Manage shrink, merchandising, and inventory control, as well as staffing and setup/pack-up of a seasonal store.
Enforce the minimum age requirement of 21 and maintain a flexible schedule for the team.
Manage physical demands of the job, including standing/walking, climbing ladders, setting up fixtures, and lifting/moving up to 50 pounds.
Utilize prior retail management experience to lead and guide the store team towards success.

education_certification.credential: Prior experience and knowledge in retail management
